text: in clouds of dust and diesel a ragged

Ukrainian government's latest defeat its
worst in months inflicted four days into
an internationally mediated ceasefire
all morning they rumbled past on the
road from debaltsevo escaping days of
relentless shelling soldiers say the
ceasefire lasted just nine hours in a
bus by the side of the road two
exhausted comrades they walked through
the night across fields to get here

ammunition
